Title: ImageCropper base on AjaxControlToolkit
Description: The image cropper provides a way to draw a crop area on an image and capture the coordinates of the drawn crop area. This control is migrated from another tool ( http://www.defusion.org.uk/code/javascript-image-cropper-ui-using-prototype-scriptaculous), which is base on the Prototype and Scriptaculous, to MS Ajax Library infrainstructure
HomeWiki:
